content: Head down the stairs to reach another large building, and a long pathway in front of it. To your right is a small frozen pond under part of a bridge, where another lesser Sea Monk hides along with a green Wisp to absorb.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
Head down the stairs to reach another large building, and a long pathway in front of it. To your right is a small frozen pond under part of a bridge, where another lesser Sea Monk hides along with a green Wisp to absorb.
